# Capital Markets â€“ Regulatory Constraints

## Mandatory Constraints
- Full trade lifecycle traceability is required.
- Market abuse controls must be enforced.
- Regulatory reporting must reflect finalized trades.

## Compliance Expectations
- Deterministic pricing and calculation logic
- Time-ordered event recording
- Clear segregation of duties

## Forbidden
- Non-auditable trade execution
- Inconsistent reporting across regulators
- Non-deterministic market behavior
